audioText: Ce dingue descends affreusement dans la douleur maintenant.
question: Ce dingue ______ affreusement dans la douleur maintenant.
explanation: The text states 'Ce dingue descends affreusement dans la douleur maintenant' - This crazy person descends terribly into pain now. 'Descends' is the second person singular present form of 'descendre' (to descend). This combines 'dingue' (crazy), 'descends' (descend), 'affreusement' (terribly), and 'douleur' (pain).
